summary: Identified 20 sorries across 5 files in Metalogic/. The sorry-free semantic_weak_completeness provides main completeness result via contrapositive. Recommended 3-phase refactoring: (1) establish sorry-free completeness path, (2) archive TaskRelation, CoherentConstruction, TruthLemma to Boneyard, (3) clean deprecated code from FMP.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive analysis of all 20 sorries, their architectural causes, and detailed refactoring strategy with implementation checklist
